cab.content: Secret.1161/m /0 j"Ua 1From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,12th November' 1919.(Received 18th.)15359. 13th November.. With reference to various references by Press Jto therecent large detachments oi' Afghan troops near our frontier it should be noted thatthese are all beyond the Durand line with the single exception of small numberbelieved to be irregulars at Wana.
